roleset.name: speak, give voice to
roleset.note: VERBALIZE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from verbalize.01-v)

example.name: verbalize-v: just transitive
example.text: I have never heard anybody verbalize and articulate exactly the way 0 I have felt *T* since I was a child...
example.arg: exactly the way 0 I have felt *T* since I was a child

example.name: make_verbalization-l
example.text: In addition , her husband had noted several episodes occurring during sleep where-1 she would throw her arms above her head and make high - pitched verbalization *-1.
